message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
